MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY15 postcode area of Cupar, affecting properties in Lovers Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 10:28PM. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Provost Wynd substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:42PM on 03 February 2021.
